00051   enum EBeamType {kElectronBeam, kMuonBeam, kPionBeam, kProtonBeam, kCosmics, kUnknown, kMixed, kPionElectronBeam, kPionProtonBeam, kCalibrationPulse, kNoise, kNBeamTypes};
00054   ExperimentalSetup &  setBeamType(EBeamType beam_type) 
00055   {
00056     obj()->setIntVal(kExperimentalSetupIntBeamType, (int) beam_type);
00057     return *this;
00058   };
00059 
00062   EBeamType getBeamType() const 
00063   {
00064     return static_cast<EBeamType>(getIntVal(kExperimentalSetupIntBeamType));
00065   };

00294   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00295     std::stringstream message;
00296     message << "i[" << kNExperimentalSetupInts << "]: beam  type"
00297             << "; f[" << kNExperimentalSetupFloats << "]: beam(E,angle[2],pos[2]), detector(angle,rot_orig[2],pos[3])";
00298     return message.str();
00299   };
